Issue.description: as a potential Fabric application developer, I want to have up-to-date documentation while v1.0 is under development. Specifically, I want to be directed to v0.6 if I am looking for stable operational platform, and I want to have documentation about how to use the v1.0 Fabric as it is being developed.
